refnamediv.refpurpose: Sort the entries with a user-defined comparison function and maintain key association

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public boolArrayObject::uasort callablecallback
This function sorts the entries such that keys maintain their correlation with the entry that they are associated with, using a user-defined comparison function.
This is used mainly when sorting associative arrays where the actual element order is significant.
